alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 245 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Miramar Beach, Point Washington, Gulf Pines, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
